author: Special Correspondent
text:
Prison authorities on Thursday turned down artist Chintan Upadhyay’s request for a bed. The authorities, however, submitted to the court that the artist can be provided with a durrie, bed-sheet and a pillow.

Upadhyay was arrested on December 28 in connection with the murder of his estranged wife Hema Upadhyay and her advocate Harish Bhambhani.

The court told senior counsel that if he required anything else he could approach the magistrate.
title: No bed for Chintan in prison cell
